short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin will help you to get disposable email fast and without leaving current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Guerilla mail plugin allow you to get disposable mail box without living your current page. When you got it, plugin will check email and shows your inbox mail. You can open and read what you got.
